title: Server Transfer
body:
I have been searching for the server transfer items in the store for so long ...

I remember finding the before the new patches but now i cant seem to find anything. Any help ??

replies.body: The store was updated recently with a [visual refresh](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-68-notes#patch-store-visual-refresh), and some content has been moved around.  Transfer services can be found on the top right of the store via a small human-gear icon.  Mousing over it should read out "Account."  I have attached a [screenshot here](http://i.imgur.com/5xlnPmP.png) to help!  Please let me know if you have any questions!
